content: it was while swatching for another project that the idea for this shawl was born with simple stitches an asymmetrical shape and an edging of petal-like points the snowdrop shawl proves that a project doesn t have to be complicated to be a knockout thanks to sewistavicki who kindly wrote up these snowdrop charts and thanks to anco den dekker for translating into dutch download file only and rosalie8 for french i m getting a lot of pms lately about the lack of the chart - please take a look at the photos you ll see the charts down at the bottom to clarify for the english version 1 or without chart at the linked site for the dutch version please download the file 1 https //web archive org/web/20150221150802/http //crochetvolution com/archives/spring-2012-archives/snowdrop-shawl
